column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Trepidation is writ plain on Lad Kenn's face.
Speak with the giant beavers.
Speak with Lad Kenn.
With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the pixie.
Speak with Nee Ys.
No, this is not the time for tears. If we hurry, we might still prevent the unthinkable from coming to pass.
You see, the marble─it was Kenn Gyuf's treasure, and Uin Hagan had always wanted one like it.
Now, Uin Hagan went to collect the marble near the lake, yes? I will give chase and try to find them.
Meanwhile, I need you to return to Phisor Lran to see if there's any change with the beaver. Afterwards, let us meet at the stables yonder.
<squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”
<squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”
<sigh> Try as I might, I couldn't find Uin Hagan. What of the beaver?
What!? Uin Hagan too!? It's my fault! It's all my fault! <sob>
...No, it's the <Emphasis>beaver</Emphasis> that's to blame! It's all that accursed creature's doing! Grrr, I'm going to teach it a lesson it'll never forget!
Lad Kenn flies off in the direction of Phisor Lran. You can't help but have a bad feeling about this...
Lad Kenn

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the enraged pixie.
<squeal> <squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”
<squeal> <squeal>
It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”
<squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”
<squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”
<squeal> <squeal> <squeal>
It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”
<squeal> <squeal>
It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”
Hm? You want to play, do you?
...Is that so? Well, it's got naught to do with me. I don't owe you anything.
If you want a reward, you must play with me first. It's only fair. Let's see, now... Yes, a couple of years ought to do it.
...Truly!? Oh, those shoes are the loveliest! When Lad Kenn flaunted them, it made me so jealous! Ah, to think that they'll be mine now!
Here's a little something by way of thanks! With that, I'm off to collect my shoes! Tee hee!
